Description: Plain convex rim and wall sherd (mended from four fragments) of Attic black-glazed pottery cup with handle root on left; fine-walled; wholly glazed ; a scratched line runs incompletely on the outside just below the rim; inscription cut on interior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ10
Curator's comments: See A. Scholtz, Aphrodite Pandemos at Naukratis, GRBS 43 (2002-3) 231. Pencilled on exterior: 211 Φ10
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 66, pl. XXI, no. 818)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 688, no. 467)
Höckmann & Möller 2006 / The Hellenion at Naukratis: Questions and Observations (p. 16, fig. 15, 16; no. 60, 85)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1817)
